description.raw:
By default, macOS and Windows use a case-preserving but case-insensitive filesystem, which means you can change the capitalization of letters in filenames, like `Profiler.hh`, but you can't have both `Profiler.hh` and `profiler.hh` in the same folder. This caused the homebrew bottle build to fail:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/label=osx_highsierra&build=112)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/label=osx_highsierra/112/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/label=osx_highsierra/112/

Since there's only one header for the profiler, I think we don't need the auto-generated header. This approach is also taken by the `loader` component of ign-plugin:

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-plugin/src/5c011c9b6a64509320e8bb56d510a8b1c5df66db/loader/CMakeLists.txt?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#CMakeLists.txt-34:36

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/generic-release-homebrew_bottle_builder/label=osx_highsierra/112/

Since there's only one header for the profiler, I think we don't need the auto-generated header. This approach is also taken by the loader component of ign-plugin:
